name: Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents
title: Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents
desc: The world shall be severed, and all shall be obliterated.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents

skills.name: Vortex Edge
skills.desc: Deals 2 Hydro DMG, then performs "Prepare Skill" for Rippling Blades.

skills.name: Torrential Shock
skills.desc: Deals 3 Hydro DMG. Creates 1 Curse of the Undercurrent on the opponent's side of the field.

skills.name: Watery Rebirth
skills.desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains Watery Rebirth.
